footer.description: Measure and improve software delivery performance with our comprehensive assessment tool.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.subtitle: Get product updates, best practices, and insights right to your inbox.

usage.title: How it works
usage.subtitle: Assess, analyze, and improve your software delivery performance in four simple steps.

1.title: Answer the questions
1.desc: Complete a short questionnaire across the Ten Factors to evaluate your current practices.

2.title: Receive your score
2.desc: Instantly get a detailed score with strengths and areas to improve.

3.title: Review best practices
3.desc: Explore actionable recommendations and best practices tailored to your results.

4.title: Track improvements
4.desc: Implement changes and track progress over time to continuously improve.

5.title: Track improvements
5.desc: Implement changes and track progress over time to continuously improve.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: See how teams improved their delivery performance with Ten-Factors.

1.title: Accelerated release cadence
1.summary: By focusing on deployment automation and CI, Acme reduced lead time while increasing quality.

2.title: Stability and speed together
2.summary: Improved incident response and change management brought fewer failures with quicker recovery.

3.title: From manual to automated
3.summary: Migrating to trunk-based development and automated tests unlocked consistent delivery.

4.title: From manual to automated
4.summary: Migrating to trunk-based development and automated tests unlocked consistent delivery.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Discover how Ten-Factors has transformed software quality for companies of different sizes and industries.

1.quote: Ten-Factors gave us a clear picture of our delivery bottlenecks and where to focus first.
1.name: Sarah Lee

2.quote: Our time to restore improved because we finally measured and tracked the right practices.
2.name: Miguel Santos

3.quote: Simple, actionable, and measurable. It helped align product and engineering on outcomes.
3.name: Anna Petrov

4.quote: The assessment exposed quick wins. Within weeks we saw fewer incidents and faster releases.
4.name: James Kim
